name: Oh no (oscarduretto)
description:
Oh No

Do you ever feel restricted by the lack of functionality in an interface? Do you get annoyed when buttons can only go to one location? Do you feel settings should change more than one thing? Well look no further as we introduce the Completely Destructible Interface, allowing you to destroy anything, anywhere, anytime, changing your interface experience.

Known issues of using this product include, inability to begin the game, inability to play the game once it has begun and getting trapped on pages as you have destroyed the back button yet again.

Please enjoy this rather silly puzzle game.

Background:

This is my first major game project (taking a little over 6 weeks to build). It's quirky, it's stupid and I love it. I hope you find enjoyment in it.
